column4: hi to all.....when i saved the page from indiabix.com,and again open it from my harddisk,it shows empty...........wat's the reason
look at the contents of the actual file you saved. Could be mnost of the page was from some javascript/extras that didtnt get saved
'books'  is vague.. theres plenty of free books out there on line
clarify whats not working about it.
so you use file -> open  and select a file.. and what happens?
run evince from a terminal, try to open somthing, look for error messages.
